column1: jeroen-van-der-linden-4601376,Jeroen,van der Linden,Consultant Energy & Inclusive Growth at Blue-Ant,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQHRNAsQQ_QhZw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1517670532078?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=hZkaa3jDZTRu2-Ux9l_xInEvvEOuCkTxwraVVd-XcS0,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D16AQEPHKz1vosf-Q/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1610108549818?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=WuxNkwDTld306Jk-KT2BPPDbKg4RUDZFLMkVhbsFnD4,personal,ACoAAAEWUMgBabqLibvd_QYiHJh9ZbsJfDKHApc,18239688,,"•
column2: More than 25 years’ experience with commercially deploying Renewable Energy technologies; developing Inclusive Growth concepts; applying Inclusive Business (IB) approaches in emerging markets.

Proven track record in business modelling for Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs); developing inclusive supply chains; design and implementation of inclusive financing mechanisms in the energy and agriculture sector.
Entrepreneurial and management experience with implementing innovative concepts of demand activation and informal distribution channels targeting Base-of-the-Pyramid (BoP) markets;
Experience with policy advice, reform and regulatory frameworks, legislation for grid and off-grid electrification (including mini-grids).
Successful in investment appraisal and finance acquisition for SMEs: appraisal / writing of investment proposals, identification of financing needs, resource mapping, sourcing public/private finance.
Application of participatory training techniques (RRA, PEDAP, RAAKS) and appraisal techniques (CBA, MCA).

Excellent interpersonal and intercultural skills.","{'country': 'Netherlands', 'short': 'Utrecht, Utrecht', 'city': 'Utrecht', 'state': 'Utrecht', 'default': 'Utrecht, Utrecht, Netherlands'}",False,False,[],"{'primary_locale': {'country': 'US', 'language': 'en'}, 'supported_locales': [{'country': 'US', 'language': 'en'}], 'profile_languages': []}",Renewables & Environment,"[{'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1991}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1996}}, 'school': {'name': 'Eindhoven University of Technology', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQG4PGSYiNG4CA/company-logo_400_400/0/1642150189320?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=N3DoxTNauqgq4Ut16o0uHUjMcyPlNKMdcMlRDP-M7E4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/eindhoven-university-of-technology/'}, 'degree_name': 'MSc', 'field_of_study': 'International Technology and Development Sciences'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1986}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1991}}, 'school': {'name': 'Technical College Eindhoven', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'degree_name': ""Bachelor's degree"", 'field_of_study': 'Engineering'}]",[],[],[],[],[],[],[],[],"[{'company': {'id': 3253458, 'name': 'NIRAS International Consulting', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFOO-fYyK05NA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519865517856?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=t7fJyPPZNGFtwKd6W4q0zlsoK54gCK6Y8nPhDlfqGwg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/niras-development-consulting/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'NIRAS International Consulting', 'description': ""The Beyond the Grid Fund for Africa (BGFA; https://beyondthegrid.africa) programme in Burkina Faso, Liberia, Mozambique, Uganda and Zambia aims to build markets for off-grid energy to bring access to clean, affordable off-grid energy to reach at least 6 million people by 2025. It works through a combination of (a) providing innovative results-based financing and Technical Assisstance to energy companies, (b) enhancing dialogue and coordination between governments, donors and private sector through Platforms for Market Change, and (c) facilitating real-time data collection, sharing of market information and analytics. BGFA's Facility Manager is the Nordic Environment Finance Corporation (Nefco); NIRAS and REEEP are implementation partners."", 'title': 'Team Leader BGFA MRV and Institutional Support Services', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 70935983, 'name': 'Blue-Ant', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF7bTdj5O85PA/company-logo_400_400/0/1609942409932?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=R_FWMQJTkay11XdYAOG4l3BTGuuQD4eQKjr7oKINtUY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/blue-antnl/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nijmegen, Gelderland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Blue-Ant', 'description': 'Providing advisory services in energy, inclusive growth, finance acquisition and policy reform. Portfolio includes:
•	Team Leader for feasibility study for a Sovereign Loan (EUR 40-50m) and an associated Technical Assistance and Capacity Building Program (EUR 7-10m) to support mini-grids development in rural areas of Myanmar.
•	DFID Green Mini-Grids Africa Regional Facility (GBP 14m) - Project Completion Review and Strategic Analysis.
•	Financial Expert for EU TAF for SE4All: Designing ElectriFI Country Windows for Kenya, Tanzania, eSwatini, Mozambique including market studies for SHS, mini-grids, clean cooking, energy efficiency and captive power, small (<10MW) IPPs investments
•	Team Leader for developing a country specific implementation framework for AECF REACT SSA funding programme in Mozambique.
•	Team Leader for HIVOS Blended Finance Study with merchant bank TWA. Analysis of blended finance mechanisms applied in energy, gender cases in Africa, Asia.
•	Team Leader for EU TAF for SE4ALL: Mozambique Rural Electrification and Policy Support. Identification/formulation of projects for Project Preparation Facility (PPF, € 10.5M) and Mozambique Energy Services Access Programme (MESAP, € 83.5M); define concession/management model for private sector involvement in Majaua Hydro Power Plant (595kW).
•	Team Leader for DFID Energy Compact Development Mozambique:  Policy barrier identification; Review of Policy and Regulatory Frameworks; recommend Policy Actions to accelerate off-grid RE solutions.
•	Member of Investment Panel of SIDA-funded Challenge Fund as part of the SNV Innovations Against Poverty (IAP) programme, providing risk capital (total € 3.9M) to SMEs in Cambodia, Ethiopia, Uganda and Zambia.
